mapper.select: select rno, rname, rcode, rtotalseat from tbl_RroomNum
select dsno, dsname, dscheck, fk_rno, fk_tno from tbl_detailseatinfo join tbl_RroomNum on fk_rno = rno where fk_tno = #{tno} and rname=#{rname} order by dsno
select dsno, dsname, rname, tname from tbl_detailseatinfo join tbl_RroomNum on fk_rno = rno join tbl_time on fk_tno = tno where dsno = #{dsno}
mapper.update: update tbl_detailseatinfo set dscheck = 1 where dsno = #{dsno}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_booklist(bno, bDate, fk_dsno, fk_perno, fk_tno) values (seq_tbl_booklist.nextval, default, #{fk_dsno}, #{fk_perno}, #{fk_tno})
mapper.select: select dsno, dsname, bookcheck, nvl(perno, 0) as perno, nvl(name, '없음') as name from ( select d.dsno, d.dsname, d.dscheck, d.fk_rno, d.fk_tno, b.bno, b.bdate from tbl_detailseatinfo d left outer join tbl_booklist b on d.dsno = b.fk_dsno where d.fk_rno = #{rno} and d.fk_tno = #{tno} ) V left outer join ( select bno, bdate, perno, fk_dsno, name, bookcheck from tbl_booklist join tbl_person on fk_perno = perno where to_date( bdate, 'yy.mm.dd' ) = to_date( #{bdate}, 'yy.mm.dd' ) )X on fk_dsno = dsno order by V.dsno

select rname, fk_rno, cnt1, cnt2, usecheck from ( select rname, rno from tbl_rroomnum )Y join ( select distinct X.fk_rno, cnt1, cnt2, usecheck from ( select count(*) as cnt1, fk_rno from tbl_booklist join tbl_detailseatinfo on fk_dsno = dsno where to_char(bdate, 'mm') = to_char(to_date(#{bdate}, 'yy.mm.dd'), 'mm') group by fk_rno )V join ( select count(*) AS cnt2, usecheck, fk_rno from tbl_booklist join tbl_detailseatinfo on fk_dsno = dsno where to_char(bdate, 'mm') = to_char(to_date(#{bdate}, 'yy.mm.dd'), 'mm') group by fk_rno, usecheck )X on V.fk_rno = X.fk_rno )Z on fk_rno = rno where usecheck = 1 order by fk_rno
mapper.update: update tbl_person set rcheck = 1 where perno =#{perno}
mapper.select: select perno, name from tbl_person join tbl_major on fk_majseq = majseq where identity = 1 and majseq=#{majseq}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_subject(subno, fk_perno, fk_majseq, subname, credit, semeter, day, time) values (subno.nextval, #{profnum}, #{majseq}, #{subname}, #{credit}, #{semeter}, #{week}||'요일', #{time1}||'~'||#{time2})
